attributes.action: Make any government document available to any citizen without cost to that citizen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If information is to be truly free in this country we need to be able to get hold of it no matter what our financial position. Imagine you had just been put on the dole and wanted to know how you could get more cash. Wouldn't it be a tragedy if you couldn't afford the relevant cost? The government should make sure that it pays the cost of dispatching the documents.
